text: Emi? E vyakti hrdayannaite allah vidheyata (islam) koraku terustado, atadu tana prabhuvu cupina velugulo nadustu untado (alanti vadu satyatiraskarito samanudu kagalada?) Evari hrdayalaite allah hitopadesam patla kathinamai poyayo, alanti variki vinasam undi. Alanti varu spastamaina margabhrastatvanlo padi unnaru
